data.app_name: World Tour - Flying on Real 3D Maps
data.description:
Welcome to amazing Adventure with World Tour!

Prepare for an exhilarating journey unlike any other as you immerse yourself in the captivating world of World Tour. With over 53 stunning cities and 23 iconic wonders of the world awaiting your exploration, get ready to start an extraordinary adventure from the comfort of your own home.

Explore Diverse Cities
- Traverse the picturesque canals of Amsterdam
- Wander through the vibrant streets of Bangkok
- Marvel at the iconic landmarks of Paris
- Experience the hustle and bustle of Tokyo

Visit Famous Landmarks
- Get up close and personal with the Great Wall of China
- Stand in awe of the majestic Taj Mahal
- Ascend the heights of the Eiffel Tower
- Discover the mysteries of Machu Picchu
- And countless other renowned landmarks brought to life in stunning 3D detail.

Choose Your Mode of Travel
- Soar through the skies in a helicopter
- Drift peacefully above the clouds in a hot air balloon
- Magical carpet ride through landscapes

Learn Fascinating Facts
- Know the history and culture of each city and landmark
- Discover interesting facts and trivia along your journey
- Expand your knowledge about the world's wonders
